column2: univ_formulas <- sapply(vars_for_table[2:length(vars_for_table)], function(x) as.formula(paste('Surv(Time_to_decreaseCox, Event_decreaseCox)~ SexCat0 + AgeNum1 + MutationCat0 +', x)))
width = 0.55, item = "forest", hjust = 0.5, heading = "Hazard ratio", linetype = "dashed",
forest_model(model_list = univ_models, covariates = vars_for_table, merge_models = F, panels =  panels)
